events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position submitted via our careers portal, thank you very much for your interest.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department, specifically for the software developer role requiring experience in backend technologies.
A recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to your application and will reach out to you shortly to discuss next steps.
The initial screening call went well; we discussed your engineering experience, your projects, and your background with software development.
Your technical interview with our senior software engineers has been scheduled for next Tuesday at 2 PM UTC via video conference.
The technical interview was completed successfully; you demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and excellent knowledge of software engineering principles.
Following your technical interview, we have scheduled an HR interview to discuss your career goals, company culture fit, and benefits package.
The HR interview concluded positively; you expressed great enthusiasm for the role and alignment with the company values.
An official job offer for the Software Engineer role has been sent to you, including details about salary, stock options, and start date.
We have received your feedback expressing excitement about the offer and appreciation for the transparency throughout the recruitment process.
You have accepted the job offer, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with HR and your manager; you have received access to all engineering resources and systems.
The hiring process has been successfully closed with you joining the engineering team as a full-time Software Engineer.
